body:
Comment 8: 
I submitted a CL that handles direct powers of two. It's unclear to me how much the
other cases matter - multipliers are getting faster - but someone should write a program
to test that. That can and probably should be done after Go 1.1. Getting the powers of
two is good enough for now.
_Labels changed: added **priority-someday**, removed **priority-later**, **go1.1**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
